languages.text: "Смешное имя для несмешного зверя. У меня есть брат, на лице которого остались отметины от его когтей. На Фенрисе ничто не безобидно и не смешно, даже барсуки".
"An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."
languages.original_text: "Смешное имя для несмешного зверя. У меня есть брат, на лице которого остались отметины от его когтей. На Фенрисе ничто не безобидно и не смешно, даже барсуки".

traits.locale_text: "An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “这个名字确实很有趣，但这种畜生本身一点都不有趣。我有个兄弟，他脸上的伤疤就是怒獾的爪子留下来的。只要是生长在芬里斯的动物，就绝不可能人畜无害，也绝不可能有趣，怒獾也不例外。”
languages.original_text: "An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."

traits.locale_text: “这个名字确实很有趣，但这种畜生本身一点都不有趣。我有个兄弟，他脸上的伤疤就是怒獾的爪子留下来的。只要是生长在芬里斯的动物，就绝不可能人畜无害，也绝不可能有趣，怒獾也不例外。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Un nombre gracioso para una bestia que no tiene ninguna gracia. Tengo un hermano cuya cara lleva las marcas de las garras de un tejón furioso. En Fenris no hay ninguna criatura graciosa ni inofensiva. Ni siquiera el tejón furioso».
languages.original_text: "An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."

traits.locale_text: «Un nombre gracioso para una bestia que no tiene ninguna gracia. Tengo un hermano cuya cara lleva las marcas de las garras de un tejón furioso. En Fenris no hay ninguna criatura graciosa ni inofensiva. Ni siquiera el tejón furioso».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「愉快でない獣の愉快な名前だ。俺の兄弟に、ラス・バッジャーの爪痕が顔に残っている者がいる。フェンリスに棲む生物に無害で愉快なものはいない。ラス・バッジャーでさえもな」
languages.original_text: "An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."

traits.locale_text: 「愉快でない獣の愉快な名前だ。俺の兄弟に、ラス・バッジャーの爪痕が顔に残っている者がいる。フェンリスに棲む生物に無害で愉快なものはいない。ラス・バッジャーでさえもな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ein amüsanter Name für eine wenig amüsante Bestie. Ich habe einen Bruder, in dessen Gesicht die Klauen eines Zornesdachses Narben hinterlassen haben. Keine Kreatur, die auf Fenris lebt, ist harmlos oder amüsant, nicht einmal Zornesdachse."
languages.original_text: "An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."

traits.locale_text: "Ein amüsanter Name für eine wenig amüsante Bestie. Ich habe einen Bruder, in dessen Gesicht die Klauen eines Zornesdachses Narben hinterlassen haben. Keine Kreatur, die auf Fenris lebt, ist harmlos oder amüsant, nicht einmal Zornesdachse."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Un nom amusant pour une bête qui n'a rien de drôle. J'ai un frère dont le visage est ravagé de cicatrices laissées par les griffes d'un blaireau colérique. Aucune créature vivant sur Fenris n'est inoffensive ou amusante, pas même les blaireaux colériques. »
languages.original_text: "An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."

traits.locale_text: « Un nom amusant pour une bête qui n'a rien de drôle. J'ai un frère dont le visage est ravagé de cicatrices laissées par les griffes d'un blaireau colérique. Aucune créature vivant sur Fenris n'est inoffensive ou amusante, pas même les blaireaux colériques. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."

languages.text: "Yüz güldürmeyen canavarın yüz güldüren adı. Bir kardeşimin yüzünde gazap porsuğunun pençe izleri var. Fenris'te yaşayan hiçbir canlı, zararsız veya eğlenceli değildir. Gazap porsukları da."
languages.original_text: "An amusing name for an unamusing beast. I have a brother whose face bears the scars of a wrath-badger's claws. No creature that lives on Fenris is harmless or amusing, not even wrath-badgers."

traits.locale_text: "Eğlenceli olmayan bir canavara eğlenceli bir isim. Bir kardeşimin yüzünde gazab-ı porsuğun pençe izleri var. Fenris'te yaşayan hiçbir canlı zararsız veya eğlenceli değildir, gazab-ı porsuklar da öyle."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
